Record.BroaderTerm: Drug, Food, Chemical or Biomedical Material
Record.Description: Compounds that contain Ozone, a highly active oxidizing agent that have application in the treatment of bacterial and viral infections, cancer diagnosis, treatment, and evaluation of disease progression. (NCI)
